item.title: Large heap of Garden Waste dumped on street, 20th August
item.description:
A large heap of garden waste apparently from the property on the SW corner of Navarino Road at the intersection with Graham Road has been dumped on the curb-side.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Graham Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Loose manhole cover making very loud noise when cars drive over, 20th August
item.description:
This has been a problem for over a year and reported many times - please can you look into this! When cars drive over the manhole cover it makes an incredibly loud noise and disrupts every resident on this end of the street. I’m quite a few houses away and it still shocks me every time it happens, so I regret to think what the closer neighbours are experiencing. There is a kids play park nearby and local hangout spot which is disrupting them too. This is a concern for (as far as I know) most of the people facing the street on this end of the road. We would all really appreciate you looking into this. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Boundary Lane, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
